This page is for students enrolled in Intermediate Writing in the Natural Sciences (ENGL 299) during Spring Quarter 2026. This intermediate writing course is linked with Nutrition for Today (NUTR 200), with the details available on [myplan](https://myplan.uw.edu/course/#/courses/NUTR200).

You can reach me at [tsherp@uw.edu](mailto:tsherp@uw.edu) with questions or to set up a meeting.
